sentences.sContent: Among them conspicuous is, the our city will be right burgeoning fractionize industry especially Internet industry, have special program and puissant support.
sentences.sContent_eng: Among them conspicuous is, the our city will be right burgeoning fractionize industry especially Internet industry, have special program and puissant support.
sentences.sCn: 其中引人注目的是，我市将对新兴细分产业特别是互联网产业，进行专门的规划和强力支持。

synos.tran: 强大的，强盛的；有势力的，有权力的

words.tran: 权力；权势；影响；（马的）越障能力测试
